document_data.name: Kriga Moonmusk
document_data.mainbody: '''Kriga Moonmusk''' was the great chief of the [[Blue Bear Tribe]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality:
Despite her advanced age, Kriga was exceptionally shrewd.

When traveling throughout [[the North]], Great Chief Kriga was transported in a fur-covered [[litter]] that was carried by four Blue Bear tribesmen.
document_data.Relationships: Kriga's daughter, [[Hydia Moonmusk|Hydia]], was a fearless warrior.
